casebody.data:
CLEVELAND
v.
BUR. OF WORKERS' COMP. 2018-0572 Supreme Court of Ohio. September 26, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On appellant's motion to lift stay and proceed to briefing. Motion granted. The clerk shall issue an order for the transmittal of the record from the Court of Appeals for Cuyahoga County, and the parties shall brief this case in accordance with the Rules of Practice.

O'Donnell, J., dissents.
